EmailTemplate.name: 12_04_14 Xccelerator Newsletter.Xccelerator December
EmailTemplate.subject: VMTurbo Partner Newsletter December 2014
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://vmturbo.com/5_0-release-webinar?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=xccelerator&utm_content=120414> 5.0 Release <http://vmturbo.com/blog/vmturbo-release-5?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=xccelerator&utm_content=120414> In November, we launched the most extensive release in VMTurbo’s history <http://vmturbo.com/press-releases/vmturbo-release-dynamic-network-control/> further enabling our customers to define and drive their environment toward the desired state, where application performance is assured while maximizing efficiency. Read the blog post <http://vmturbo.com/blog/vmturbo-release-5?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=xccelerator&utm_content=120414> or watch the webcast <http://vmturbo.com/5_0-release-webinar?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=xccelerator&utm_content=120414> to learn what's new. VMTurbo Launches 5 New Control Modules
- Network Control Module <http://cdn.vmturbo.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/10/VMT%20Network%20Control%20Module%20Data%20Sheet%20Nov%202014.pdf> - Hybrid Cloud Control Module <http://cdn.vmturbo.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/10/VMT%20Hybrid%20Cloud%20Control%20Module%20Data%20Sheet%20Nov%202014.pdf> - VDI Control Module <http://cdn.vmturbo.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/10/VMT%20VDI%20Control%20Module%20Data%20Sheet%20Nov%202014.pdf> - Application Control Module <http://cdn.vmturbo.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/10/VMT%20Application%20Control%20Module%20Data%20Sheet%20Nov%202014.pdf> - Container Control Module <http://cdn.vmturbo.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/10/VMT%20Container%20Control%20Module%20Data%20Sheet%20Nov%202014.pdf>
Watch 5.0 Overview Video Virtualization Professional Services - with VMTurbo
We've recently witnessed increased awareness and demand for VMTurbo within the Virtualization Professional Services sphere. Our November webinar <http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-webcast-opensky-vdi-orchestration?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=xccelerator&utm_content=120414> featured Don McKeith of OpenSky Corp. and the Enterprise Orchestration Framework he built using VMTurbo. Members of our Green Circle Community (see image) have requested access to vendors with experience in both VMware® and VMTurbo for upcoming integration projects. Join The Green Circle Community <http://greencircle.vmturbo.com/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=xccelerator&utm_content=120414> Arista Networks Webinar: Dec. 17th
Join this webinar to learn about Arista Networks’ exciting disruptions within the networking landscape, as well as the ways in which VMTurbo drives dynamic network localization decisions to achieve near-zero latency in Arista environments. Register for Arista Networks Webinar <http://vmturbo.com/arista-networks-webinar?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=xccelerator&utm_content=120414>
VMTurbo Parter Resources
- New Customer Jumpstart | December 9th <http://go.vmturbo.com/12-09-2014-New-Customer-Jumpstart.html?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=xccelerator&utm_content=120414> - VMTurbo Partner Portal <https://vmturbo.partnerprm.com/vert/Default/login.aspx> - VMTurbo Partner Battlecard <http://vmturbo.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/04/VMTurbo-Partner-Battlecard.pdf> - VMTurbo for MSPs <http://vmturbo.com/blog/thanks-peak-10-cloud-service-provider-extraordinaires?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=xccelerator&utm_content=120414> <http://vmturbo.com/arista-networks-webinar?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=xccelerator&utm_content=120414> ABOUT:VIRTUALIZATION is VMTurbo's virtualization blog. Cloud, SDx, DevOps, & more! 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087 contacts <http://vmturbo.com/company/contact-vmturbo/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ticker> | website <http://www.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ticker> | privacy policy <http://www.vmturbo.com/privacy-policy?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ticker> | forward <{{system.forwardToFriendLink:default=edit%20me}}>
